title: Amazon Catalog VA
job_overview:
Join a fast-growing New York-based e-commerce company dedicated to delivering top-quality products and seamless customer experiences on Amazon. Our client is looking for a detail-oriented and proactive Amazon Catalog Manager to maintain, optimize, and expand our product listings to ensure maximum visibility, accuracy, and conversion.

What You’ll Do:
- Manage the creation, updating, and optimization of product listings on Amazon Seller Central
- Ensure all listings follow Amazon's guidelines and are fully optimized with accurate titles, bullet points, descriptions, images, and keywords
- Monitor and resolve listing issues, including suppressed listings, stranded ASINs, or variation errors
- Execute keyword research and SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings and product visibility
- Handle flat file uploads and bulk listing adjustments to streamline catalog management
- Coordinate with internal teams on inventory, pricing, and product updates
 -Work with Amazon Seller Support to troubleshoot listing and catalog issues
 - Analyze listing performance and recommend improvements based on data and trends

Interested applicants must be able to work from 9am-530pm US EST.  Email your resume, a brief cover letter detailing your experience with Amazon catalog management including the types of listings you’ve handled and the link to your work samples to Upgrade to see actual info
